attributes.action: contact the Israeli government and secure the safe passage of Khaled Mudallal and all students in Gaza studying abroad so that they may return to thier studies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned condemn the Israeli government’s aggression against Palestine and the decision to declare the Gaza strip a “hostile entity”. 
We demand that the Prime Minister does all in his power to secure the right to travel for Khaled Mudallal and all other Palestinians.
Since Israel identified Gaza as "hostile territory" hundreds of students are unable to return to their studies abroad.
We also call upon the British Government to recognise the right to education of the Palestinian people and demand the Israeli government to  allow freedom of movement for all Palestinians in and out of the Israeli occupied Palestinian territories.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "contact the Israeli government and secure the safe passage of Khaled Mudallal and all students in Gaza studying abroad so that they may return to thier studies."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13771.asp

Prime Minister's Office
